it.polimi.se2019.map

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.map.Block
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    defines a block with its sides, doors, room, ammocard, weaponcards, spawnpoint, possible paths, players and coordinates
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Block

        public Block(boolean spawnPoint,
             int x,
             int y,
             Room room)
        constructs a new block defining its parameters
        Parameters:
        spawnPoint - is a boolean value that determines if the block is spawn point
        x - indicates the first cartesian coordinate of the block
        y - indicates the second cartesian coordinate of the block
        room - specifies the room of the block

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected(Block block)
        checks if the blocks are close and connected with a door
        Parameters:
        block - block connected with this one through a door
        Returns:
        true if the block is near to this one and there is a door, return false if the block is near to this block but there's not a door between them
